channel.title: Stick RPG - Guide To Riches
channel.description:
OK well first you need to get to the game, you can do this by going to http://www.xgenstudios.com/play/stickrpg, in this guide, i will explain 2 ways of becoming rich, the fair way and the cheating way... [hr] [center][b][u]Game Controls[/u][/b] To Move - W,A,S,D // Arrow Keys To Enter Building - Just Walk In The Door Skateboard (if you have it) - SHIFT Car (if you have it) - 'C' NORTH WEST EAST SOUTH[/center] [hr] [b][u]Things And The Meaning's[/u][/b] [img]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/7953/meaningsok6.gif[/img] 1. your job title, you can work at 'New Lines Corp. 2. Your Charm Level, you can raise it by drinking beer, smoking, and or buying a mini bar 3. Your Intelligence, you can raise this by going to the school and studying and going to class, you can also watch the news 4. You Strength, you can raise this by going to the GYM at the school, fighting, and or buying a treadmill 5. Your Karma, hmm guess it would help if i remember it uses and stuff, soz 6. Your Net Worth, all you Cash[sup](14)[/sup] and you bank money added, your loans are subtracted[sub](sp?)[/sub] 7. Game Length, You either selected 30, 50, 100, or unlimited (may not be exact #'s) at the begging of the game 8. Music for the game, choose for it to be 'ON' or 'OFF' 9. Optimize, makes it so the lines stay the same when you move 10. Shows your FPS[sup](10)[/sup] 11. Quits the game 12. Your FPS (frames per second) to more you have the faster the game is running (I think) 13. Your Health, don't let it get to low! 14. Your money on-hand, wouldn't keep very much with you (put in bank) 15. The Clock for the day, the opaque blue represent time passed 16. The day your currently on 17. The name you picked at the beginning of the game[/center][/left] [hr] [b][u]Game Play, The Fair Way[/u][/b] OK start the game off and go EAST until you see a street then go SOUTH go down that road until you see a Yellow-Orange building, it will be EAST walk into the store and buy 1 pack of [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/6295/smokesoh7.gif[/img](10$) now click the 'Leave' button and and go NORTH until you find a guy standing at the corner, click on him and give him the [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/6295/smokesoh7.gif[/img], you now have a skateboard so you move around faster, the next thing we're going to want to do is get a job, but first we need knowledge so lets get that, if your still standing by the kid you gave [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/6295/smokesoh7.gif[/img] to then go NORTH then go EAST on the next road you find, go to the end of it and enter the university, or 'U of S', click [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/3596/studyqg5.gif[/img] until your clock[sup](15)[/sup] is full of dark blue once it is exit U of S and click on the [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/812/backpackdw1.gif[/img], now in your backpack click [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/2889/housece5.gif[/img], your now in your house click SLEEP now go back to the university until your out of time, now home do this until your intelligence is 250, once it is go home and sleep, now from your house go EAST until you find a Grey building, enter it and keep applying for jobs until you are CEO then work until you have about 5000$ once you do go home and go to sleep, now from your home go EAST until your at the end of the street then go SOUTH until you reach the end then enter the building to the EAST, its a purple pawn shop, once in buy an alarm clock now exit and go to the yellow-orange shop (the shop you bought [img]http://img80.imageshack.us/img80/6295/smokesoh7.gif[/img] in) buy about 2,000$ worth of [img]http://img296.imageshack.us/img296/7426/pillsca9.gif[/img], these make it so you will wake up at the beginning of the day, now go home and then to work then home and work and keep doing this until you have 100,000-1,000,000+, the more the better, now go home sleep and SAVE!! you must SAVE!!! once you saved exit your house, (make sure you have ALL of your money) and go EAST then SOUTH at the street go all the way SOUTH until you find a blue building with dice on the roof, this is the casino and click [img]http://img129.imageshack.us/img129/9563/cardsyd0.gif[/img] now do the following keyboard functions [TAB]>[TAB]>[TAB]>and hold enter until ALL of your money has been bet now play, if you lose click the refresh button on your browser, if you win, congrats you just doubled your money, OK if you lost re-do until you win, if you win then go to the bank and bank HALF of your money now SAVE SAVE SAVE, and keep doing this until your rich rich rich, after you have about 1,000,000+ go to the bank and buy the castle then furniture, and well if you keep doing this then well you'll be very very rich in no time... [hr] [b][u]Game Play, The UN-Fair Way[/u][/b] Well there's not so much to this one, just when you enter your name put
[code]HEYZEUS!!!![/code]
, this starts you with all your stats at 555, and gives you 10,000$ [hr] [b][u]Hints and tips[/u][/b] * To get the yellow car get your intelligence to i think 300 or 350 and hot wire it * Walking, Riding, Driving into cars does hurt you... * to take the bus you need to buy 1 [img]http://img296.imageshack.us/img296/7426/pillsca9.gif[/img] and sleep then dont do anything but go to the bus station * get a sports car if u have yellow car after 365 days of game play -Thanks avistetto [hr] [center][url=http://www.everything-known.net][img]http://everything-known.net/advert.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

item.title: Stick RPG - Guide To Riches
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

OK well first you need to get to the game, you can do this by going to http://www.xgenstudios.com/play/stickrpg, in this guide, i will explain 2 ways of becoming rich, the fair way and the cheating way…
[hr]

[center]Game Controls

To Move - W,A,S,D // Arrow Keys
To Enter Building - Just Walk In The Door
Skateboard (if you have it) - SHIFT
Car (if you have it) - ‘C’

    NORTH
    WEST          EAST
    SOUTH[/center]

[hr]

Things And The Meaning’s

  1. your job title, you can work at 'New Lines Corp.
  2. Your Charm Level, you can raise it by drinking beer, smoking, and or buying a mini bar
  3. Your Intelligence, you can raise this by going to the school and studying and going to class, you can also watch the news
  4. You Strength, you can raise this by going to the GYM at the school, fighting, and or buying a treadmill
  5. Your Karma, hmm guess it would help if i remember it uses and stuff, soz
  6. Your Net Worth, all you Cashsup[/sup] and you bank money added, your loans are subtractedsub[/sub]
  7. Game Length, You either selected 30, 50, 100, or unlimited (may not be exact #'s) at the begging of the game
  8. Music for the game, choose for it to be ‘ON’ or ‘OFF’
  9. Optimize, makes it so the lines stay the same when you move
  10. Shows your FPSsup[/sup]
  11. Quits the game
  12. Your FPS (frames per second) to more you have the faster the game is running (I think)
  13. Your Health, don’t let it get to low!
  14. Your money on-hand, wouldn’t keep very much with you (put in bank)
  15. The Clock for the day, the opaque blue represent time passed
  16. The day your currently on
  17. The name you picked at the beginning of the game[/center][/left]

[hr]

Game Play, The Fair Way
OK start the game off and go EAST until you see a street then go SOUTH go down that road until you see a Yellow-Orange building, it will be EAST walk into the store and buy 1 pack of (10$) now click the ‘Leave’ button and and go NORTH until you find a guy standing at the corner, click on him and give him the , you now have a skateboard so you move around faster, the next thing we’re going to want to do is get a job, but first we need knowledge so lets get that, if your still standing by the kid you gave to then go NORTH then go EAST on the next road you find, go to the end of it and enter the university, or ‘U of S’, click until your clocksup[/sup] is full of dark blue once it is exit U of S and click on the , now in your backpack click , your now in your house click SLEEP now go back to the university until your out of time, now home do this until your intelligence is 250, once it is go home and sleep, now from your house go EAST until you find a Grey building, enter it and keep applying for jobs until you are CEO then work until you have about 5000$ once you do go home and go to sleep, now from your home go EAST until your at the end of the street then go SOUTH until you reach the end then enter the building to the EAST, its a purple pawn shop, once in buy an alarm clock now exit and go to the yellow-orange shop (the shop you bought in) buy about 2,000$ worth of , these make it so you will wake up at the beginning of the day, now go home and then to work then home and work and keep doing this until you have 100,000-1,000,000+, the more the better, now go home sleep and SAVE!! you must SAVE!!! once you saved exit your house, (make sure you have ALL of your money) and go EAST then SOUTH at the street go all the way SOUTH until you find a blue building with dice on the roof, this is the casino and click now do the following keyboard functions [TAB]>[TAB]>[TAB]>and hold enter until ALL of your money has been bet now play, if you lose click the refresh button on your browser, if you win, congrats you just doubled your money, OK if you lost re-do until you win, if you win then go to the bank and bank HALF of your money now SAVE SAVE SAVE, and keep doing this until your rich rich rich, after you have about 1,000,000+ go to the bank and buy the castle then furniture, and well if you keep doing this then well you’ll be very very rich in no time…

[hr]

Game Play, The UN-Fair Way

Well there’s not so much to this one, just when you enter your name put

HEYZEUS!!!!
, this starts you with all your stats at 555, and gives you 10,000$

[hr]

Hints and tips

  • To get the yellow car get your intelligence to i think 300 or 350 and hot wire it

  • Walking, Riding, Driving into cars does hurt you…

  • to take the bus you need to buy 1 and sleep then dont do anything but go to the bus station

  • get a sports car if u have yellow car after 365 days of game play -Thanks avistetto

[hr]

[center][/center]

Read full topic
